segments.text: Lisa , I need some help here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I need to get some female stuff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean stuff like tampons and sanitary napkins ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I didn't know what they're called in English .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Follow me . All the things you need as a woman are in aisles 10 and 11 . This section is usually near the medicine section in any supermarket .
segments.speaker: S2
